name: Garlic Bread
ingredients: Bread, Butter, Parsley, Garlic, Parmesan Cheese, Salt
instructions: Melt butter. Mince garlic. Mix butter, salt, garlic, Parmesan cheese, and parsley flakes. Spread the garlic butter mixture onto the bread. Broil or toast until cheese melts

name: Chive Pancake
instructions: Rinse and chop the greens of chives into small pieces. Mix chives, flour, egg(s), a lot of salt, and cold water until well combined. Pan fry oth sides with oil until golden brown spots. Optionally cook with {Bacon} bits

name: Pan Fried Scallops
instructions: Remove side muscle, pat dry, and season both sides with salt and pepper. Pan fry in oil until golden brown. Reduce to simmer, flip, and baste in butter for a minute. Serve with residual butter

name: Meatballs
ingredients: Ground Beef, Sausage, Onions, Garlic, Parsley, Breadcrumbs, Eggs, Milk, Salt, Pepper, Parmesan Cheese, Marinara Sauce
instructions: Mince onions and garlic. Mix beef, sausage, onions, garlic, parsley, breadcrumbs, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese. Form balls without over-mixing. Shallow fry the balls until brown. Simmer balls in marinara sauce with lid (~10 mins)

name: Bacon Wrapped Smokies
ingredients: Mini Hot Dog, Bacon, Brown Sugar, Toothpicks
instructions: Slice bacon into thirds. Wrap each dog with bacon and secure with a toothpick. Sprinkle with brown sugar and bake until carmelized

name: Kani Salad
instructions: Shred imitation crab by rolling sticks between hands. Mix with mayonnaise and Sriracha in a 2:1 ratio
